replies.msg:
促請學校停課聲明

十一月十一日早上，警員在無警示、無生命威脅的情況下任意地近距離向學生連開數發實彈，並有數名示威者中槍，情況垂危。警方更於多處施放催淚彈，影響附近學校。警方濫暴問題已非一朝一夕之事，而是五個月來不斷越演越烈。直至現在，學生連日常生活也備受生命威脅，校方無法確保同學上下課安全，學生於校園受到催淚毒氣影響，香港學生正處於水深火熱之中。有見及此，我等學生組織現促請校方立刻實行無限期停課直至學生生命安全受保障為止。

Hong Kong Students Urge School Suspension

On 11 November, under no circumstances of observable threats to life, the Hong Kong police force shot protesters with live rounds multiple times without issuing any prior warnings. Several protestors were critically injured by the shots. Meanwhile, tear gas was fired in almost all districts of Hong Kong, including inside the private premises of university campuses. Such abuse of power by the police is not unprecedented, and has been becoming more severe and violent in the past five months. Currently, the personal safety of students is being threatened. It is incontrovertible that school campuses would no longer be able to provide a safe shelter for students, since highly toxic tear gas is now spread all around the city. It should also be noted that there have also been a suspension of school in various universities, while secondary school students have yet to be protected by such measures. We, secondary school students of Hong Kong are now in a state of desperation and sincerely urge that suspension of schools be promptly adopted until our personal safety can be ensured.

眾學生組織
-中學生連線
-本土青年動力
-學生同協
-香城中學
-學生動源
-青年反修例關注組
-中學生反修例關注組
-中學生罷課籌備平台
-中學時政
-學聯匯知
-聚港青政
-紫荊之殤

P.S. 有良心校長問過 EDB 有關停課問題， EDB 唔肯停

如遇意外，敢問學校的第三者保險是否涵蓋，以及校方能否承擔學生人命傷亡的責任？

基於保障學生安全，作為貴校學校的家長，督請 貴校考慮自行安排停課。期望 貴校盡早作出決定，讓家長有足夠時間安排人手照顧子女。

促請學校停課聲明

十一月十一日早上，警員在無警示、無生命威脅的情況下任意地近距離向學生連開數發實彈，並有數名示威者中槍，情況垂危。警方更於多處施放催淚彈，影響附近學校。警方濫暴問題已非一朝一夕之事，而是五個月來不斷越演越烈。直至現在，學生連日常生活也備受生命威脅，校方無法確保同學上下課安全，學生於校園受到催淚毒氣影響，香港學生正處於水深火熱之中。有見及此，我等學生組織現促請校方立刻實行無限期停課直至學生生命安全受保障為止。

Hong Kong Students Urge School Suspension

On 11 November, under no circumstances of observable threats to life, the Hong Kong police force shot protesters with live rounds multiple times without issuing any prior warnings. Several protestors were critically injured by the shots. Meanwhile, tear gas was fired in almost all districts of Hong Kong, including inside the private premises of university campuses. Such abuse of power by the police is not unprecedented, and has been becoming more severe and violent in the past five months. Currently, the personal safety of students is being threatened. It is incontrovertible that school campuses would no longer be able to provide a safe shelter for students, since highly toxic tear gas is now spread all around the city. It should also be noted that there have also been a suspension of school in various universities, while secondary school students have yet to be protected by such measures. We, secondary school students of Hong Kong are now in a state of desperation and sincerely urge that suspension of schools be promptly adopted until our personal safety can be ensured.

眾學生組織
-中學生連線
-本土青年動力
-學生同協
-香城中學
-學生動源
-青年反修例關注組
-中學生反修例關注組
-中學生罷課籌備平台
-中學時政
-學聯匯知
-聚港青政
-紫荊之殤

P.S. 有良心校長問過 EDB 有關停課問題， EDB 唔肯停
